## Toolbit Desktop App

### Downloads (choose your OS)
- **macOS**: `.pkg` installer (recommended) or `.dmg` (drag Toolbit to Applications)
- **Windows**: `.exe` installer
- **Linux**: `.AppImage` (portable) or `.deb`

### Notes
- The web version is available at https://toolbit.pages.dev/
- All tools run locally; no data leaves your device.

### Changes
See the commit history for this release.
